  • All Classes
Packages 
Package Description
es.uc3m.baldo.opinais
This is the root package for the Opinais framework.
es.uc3m.baldo.opinais.adt
This package stores auxiliar data structures, which may be used by some specific functionalities of the algorithm.
es.uc3m.baldo.opinais.core
This package contains the basic classes required by the AIS-based algorithm, such as the enumerated type representing a Bit, as well as the Individual class itself and a class storing all the application properties.
es.uc3m.baldo.opinais.core.algorithms
This package contains algorithms for generating the classifier, defined by a detector for each type.
es.uc3m.baldo.opinais.core.detectors
This package provides the detectors classes, which are entities (simulating the antibodies in natural immune systems) which detects individuals of a certain type.
es.uc3m.baldo.opinais.core.operators
This package provides classes performing the evolutionary operators for the algorithm, such as crossover and mutation.
es.uc3m.baldo.opinais.core.types
This package stores a Type enum which contains the possible values for the individuals type.
es.uc3m.baldo.opinais.experimenter
This package provides classes to ease the experimentation task.
es.uc3m.baldo.opinais.ir
This package provides classes to retrieve a set of individuals (which are already in the format required by the AIS-based algorithms.
es.uc3m.baldo.opinais.ir.extractors
This package stores all the features extractors, which are objects aimed at extracting a list of features from a set of items.
es.uc3m.baldo.opinais.ir.items
This package stores all the items, which are objects which can be converted to a genome (array of bits) to be used with the AIS-based algorithm.
es.uc3m.baldo.opinais.ir.preprocessors
This package stores all the pre-processors, which perform some processing over the items before they are used.
es.uc3m.baldo.opinais.ir.readers
This package stores all the readers, which are used to generate a set of objects from a specified input file.
es.uc3m.baldo.opinais.ir.readers.factories
This package stores all the factories, which are used to generate a new object from another object (usually, some text or database result).
es.uc3m.baldo.opinais.ir.vectorizers
This package stores all the vectorizers, whose function is to translate individuals into a genome (i.e., an array of bits), which is required by the evolutionary algorithm to work.
es.uc3m.baldo.opinais.selectors
This package stores all the selectors, which are used by an evolutionary algorithm to select a detector from a population.
